name.label: Connector name
name.description: Assign a name to uniquely identify the connection (minimum of 5 characters and no spaces)

description.label: Connector description
description.description: Assign a description to indicate the purpose of the connection

apphostId.label: Edge gateway
apphostId.description: Specify an edge gateway if the connection is to run on an edge gateway.

frequency.label: Frequency
frequency.description: Select how frequently this connection will pull data from the asset

time.label: Time (UTC)
time.description: Set the UTC time to run connector to pull data from data source

help.label: Help
help.description: More details on the datasource setting can be found in the specified link

host.label: Management IP address or Hostname
host.description: Specify the QRadar management IP address or Hostname.

port.label: Host port
port.description: Specify the associated port number of the data source.

uba.label: Enable access to UBA API
uba.description: Select if this connection will access the UBA API

sec.label: Authorized services token
sec.description: A service token generated in QRadar's 'Admin' tab
